title: Ore de Ii no, Mito-kun
sinopse:
"Can you look at me in that way...?"

While they were working late at night, Karaki was confessed to by his junior, Mito. Since then, he naturally became conscious of Mito in everyday life. Little by little, he learns something new about Mito. Everyday, Karaki's feelings are slowly changing...

(Source: Kasakura Shuppansha, translated)

Included one-shot: Migimimi to Sokubaku
